name: Trader Tavern
description:
By day, tavern patrons would like to trade. But after sunset, the rainbows turn on, and the traders aren't interested in business...

DAYTIME FEATURES

  • Upgrade old books to a glitter of hope to reach the ending
  • Patrons need to check the time before they'll trade with you

NIGHTTIME FEATURES

  • In the wee hours, the bartender will turn on electronic music
  • The man in the corner will summon cats
  • One of the patrons is learning how to dance...

EACH VERSION STARTS AT A DIFFERENT HOUR

  • Browser—at dawn, when business begins
  • Windows—in the afternoon, when it's time to surf for cat memes
  • Mac OS X—at night, when the party's getting started
  • Linux—at midnight, when I worked on this jam

MADE FOR TRIJAM #60: the three-hour game jam

I wanted to learn how to manipulate a lighting plug-in for RMMV, and Trijam #60's theme was "When the lights turn off," so I couldn't resist...

This tavern, like our two-minute chicken coop mini-sim, is designed as a business mini-sim to be plugged into a build-a-town for our upcoming RPG Maker MV project, Worlds They Dream. 

So it's a mini-game for a mini-game in our upcoming game! 

Let us know if you have any suggestions.
